567810.name: Furi - One More Fight
567810.description:
«You took so much from me. I will make you pay... A blow for all the ones you killed.» - The Flame

Stand up for your freedom one more time in this fight against The Flame, a revengeful opponent that will challenge your skills and test your wit to the extremes.
Character design by Takashi Okazaki and music by Scattle!
This pack features:
- A complete new fight against The Flame
- In a new arena designed for this bossfight
- Playable in Furi and Furier difficulty modes
And that’s all, or is it?
The additional content is accessible directly from the main menu.
567810.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
